name: Creb
description:
Evil crebs have taken over the world! You, the balding gangster, have bad blood with the feisty claw crushing mongrels. Unlucky for you, you don't have any weapons strong enough to fight the crebs! Your solution, COMBINE WEAPONS.

In this 2D shooter, you need to combine items to make new weapons. Use these weapons to survive against the crebs.

Compete for the highest score possible by killing as many crebs before dying.

This game was made for the SpaceScore game jam that took place on the 20th of March, 2021. The game was made within 72 hours by Jayden (Development) and Evan (Visuals and Sound).

CONTROLS: Movement - WASD Aiming - Cursor Shoot - Left Click
